channel.title: Exp Rates
channel.description: yoo, if someone could tell me what to search to find the exp rates on a delta source, i would be greatful, Thanks :) Koed

item.title: Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

317 Serverâ€¦
In client.java
Should look very similar to this

					if (UseBow) {
						TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff * 2); // added *2 for
						// faster
						// leveling
						// -bakatool
						TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
						addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);
					} else if (FightType != 3) {
						TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff * 2); // added *2 for
						// faster
						// leveling
						// -bakatool
						TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
						addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID);
					} else {
						TotalExp = (double) (60 * hitDiff * 2); // added *2 for
						// faster
						// leveling
						// -bakatool2
						TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
						addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
						addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
						addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
					}
